sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>next</radical> <radical>shellfish</radical> will be yours, but this shellfish will be mine. These are the <kanji>resources</kanji> we have to share and distribute.
meaningInfo: Our resources are based around a system of trading shellfish. It's not that weird, plenty of ancient societies used shellfish as their main resource!
readingMnemonic: You save up all of your <kanji>resources</kanji> so you can buy a <reading>shee</reading>p (<ja>し</ja>). You bring a big sack of your shellfish resources to the market and finally get to pick out that sheep you've had your eyes on for months.
readingInfo: Of course you're going to use your resources to get a sheep. You're living in a time when shellfish are used to trade for goods and services!
